email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR (DWT: 150,000, LOA: 300m) available for your steel coils shipment from Rotterdam to Shanghai. Cargo size is 12,000MT on CIF terms. Starting freight quote is USD 75/MT. Laycan is 25-30 October. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the offer. USD 75/MT seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I can offer USD 70/MT. Demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 70/MT is better. Can we push it to USD 68/MT? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 27 October - 1 November?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 68/MT is possible. Laycan adjusted to 27 October - 1 November. Please confirm.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN STAR
- Cargo: 12,000MT Steel Coils
- Load Port: Rotterdam
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 27 October - 1 November
- Freight: USD 68/MT
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best,
Sarah
